page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content: Warleggan and Cardinham{Womens Instute meet on the first Tuesday every month at the Jubilee Hall Mount.There are 28 members.The Instute was first formed 27 years ago.The president is Shiela Worden,secretary Mavis Ball treasurer Joan Jackson.There are still several founder members.The Cornwall chairman Sue Oliver is also a member.Warleggan {Young Farmers}meet on Mondays at the hall Mount.Every Wednesday evening a {keep fit class}meets run by Jean O'Connor.The{Mount Social Club}which started in 1903 is for men only. Members meet every Monday but each member has a key to play any time. Only 2 games are available darts and billiards.The subscription is Â£1.50 per year plus 10p per game.
